src.java.index

Class CSVIndexReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.java.index.CSVIndexReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexReader

    public class CSVIndexReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements IndexReader
    This implementation of IndexReader reads an InvertedIndex object from the disk, with a format similar to CSV.
    Example: term, documentId:DocumentFrequency,documentId:DocumentFrequency, ...
    Since:
    10-16-2017
    See Also:
    CSV

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCorpusSize()
      java.lang.String getScoringSystem()
      Tokenizer getTokenizer()
      void parseDocumentIndexFromFile(java.io.File docIndexFile, DocumentIndex docIndex)
      This function parses the file that contains the document index
      void parseInvertedIndex(java.io.File indexFile, InvertedIndex index)
      This function parses the file that contains the invertedIndex, reads the header from file which indicates the type of Tokenizer used in the indexation, after that loads an InvertedIndex object with terms and their respective Posting lists.

    • Method Detail

      • getTokenizer

        public Tokenizer getTokenizer()
        Specified by:
        getTokenizer in interface IndexReader
        Returns:
        The Tokenizer that was used to create the InvertedIndex, this information is located on the header of the invertedIndex file, more precisely, the first line of the file.

      • getCorpusSize

        public int getCorpusSize()
        Specified by:
        getCorpusSize in interface IndexReader
        Returns:
        The size of the corpus that originated the index

      • getScoringSystem

        public java.lang.String getScoringSystem()
        Specified by:
        getScoringSystem in interface IndexReader
        Returns:
        The tag that identifies the scoring system used to create the index.
        See Also:
        Constants

      • parseInvertedIndex

        public void parseInvertedIndex(java.io.File indexFile,
                               InvertedIndex index)
        This function parses the file that contains the invertedIndex, reads the header from file which indicates the type of Tokenizer used in the indexation, after that loads an InvertedIndex object with terms and their respective Posting lists.
        Specified by:
        parseInvertedIndex in interface IndexReader
        Parameters:
        indexFile - The File on disk that contains the invertedIndex.
        index - The InvertedIndex object to be filled in the contents of the index file.

      • parseDocumentIndexFromFile

        public void parseDocumentIndexFromFile(java.io.File docIndexFile,
                                       DocumentIndex docIndex)
        This function parses the file that contains the document index
        Specified by:
        parseDocumentIndexFromFile in interface IndexReader
        Parameters:
        docIndexFile - The file where the document index is written in to
        docIndex - The DocumentIndex object to be filled in the contents of the file
